entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR LATE THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
